About us

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-home” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1563913673158{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1535355581442{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

KARACHI PAINTS – Karachi Paints is a sister concern of the well known Karachi Paint House © group of companies. Our decorative, industrial, marine paints & paint raw materials range won the admiration, applause and confidence of the professionals and prestigious consultants. We, at Karachi Paints© serve the purpose of being complete paint suppliers, manufacturer representatives & distributors. We boast having all varieties of all well-known brands of paints as well as construction chemicals.

[/vc_column_text]
